thread.title: NBA's D-League renamed G-League after Gatorade sponsorship
thread.title_full: NBA's D-League renamed G-League after Gatorade sponsorship

author: Sara Harris (sharris@sportingnews.com)
title: NBA's D-League renamed G-League after Gatorade sponsorship
text:
The name change is part of a multiyear partnership between the NBA and Gatorade, according to Sports Illustrated . 
From SI's report: 
"This is the first deal between a U.S. professional sports league and an entitlement partner. As part of the deal, a new NBA G-League logo will be featured on new game balls, team jerseys, on-court signage and digital properties. G-League teams will also have assistance from the Gatorade Sports Science Institute to collaborate with programs to enhance player sports performance and recovery." 
USA Today reports the partnership will incorporate the Gatorade Sports Science Institute and Gatorade scientists, who will help with player nutrition and training programs. 
From USA Today's report: 
"Beyond the new logos that will be forthcoming on game balls and team jerseys for the league’s 25 teams, or the signage on the court and online, it’s the Gatorade Sports Science Institute that’s the epicenter of their excitement." Watch This
